alert.note: Alert for Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:03PM EDT until July 02 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Walker County in northwestern Georgia... Central Dade County in northwestern Georgia... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 403 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rising Fawn, or 7 miles south of Trenton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cloudland Canyon State Park, Cooper Heights and Rising Fawn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
